item.title: Home 5
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="home-5" slidertitle="Home 5"][/rev_slider]

Love & Pets Fund

donation$25

Dog Care Fund

donation

$20

HELP YOUR FURRY FRIEND

You Can Help Us to Take Care of our Furry Friends

Facilisi cras fermentum odio eu. Volutpat lacus laoreet curabitur. Cursus turpis in eu mi bibendum neque egestas purus congue. Scelerisque purus semper eget duis at tellus.

Awarded Service

Penatibus magnis parturient nascetur ridiculus.maecenas.

Pets Game Zone

Habitant se tristique senectus interdum hendrerit gravida.

Mission

Vision

Values

Always care

Take Part in Pets Life Saving

Porttitor eget dolor morbi non arcu risus. Eget mauris pharetra et ultrices neque ornare aenean. Ligula ullamcorper malesuada proin libero nunc consequat interdum varius sit. Dignissim suspendisse in est ante.

250%

Pets need help

$1500k

raised now

750k+

volunteers

donate now
HOW WE HELP

Give Animal Shelter

Elementum sagittis vitae et leo duis ut diam quam nulla. Sodales ut etiam sit amet nisl purus in mollis nunc. 

completed program0% program for this month0% donate now
Safe + Easy Donations

Work in More Than 5k Countries

We help donors make safe and easy US tax-deductible donations to vetted, locally-driven organizations around the world. Donations are tax-deductible, taxpayers can give in GBP and claim an extra 25% if Gift Aid eligible.

Help Puppies by Paying for Veterinarian Services

52%Goal:$20,000Raised:$10,500To Go:$9,500
donate now

Watch Video

OUR SERVICES

What Make Us Different

New Home

Cursus risus at ultrices tempus imperdiet nulla malesuada pellentesque.

Veterinary Help

Ultricies lacus sed turpis tincidunt aliquet risus feugiat mollis nunc sed.

Make Pets Happy

Mattis nunc sed blandit libero volutpat sed cras gravida neque convallis.

Natural Food

Sapien pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus netus convallis cursus.

250

Years of
Foundation

500+

monthly
donors

20,5k

incredible
volunteers

7250

successful
campains

Safe + Easy Donations

Saving Even One Pet Will Change the World

Egestas tellus rutrum tellus pellentesque eu tincidunt tortor. In cursus turpis massa tincidunt dui ut. Sagittis aliquam malesuada bibendum arcu. Sodales ut etiam sit amet nisl purus in mollis nunc. Odio eu feugiat pretium nibh ipsum consequat.

SHELTER

The Opportunity to Help Shelter with Food

Diam volutpat commodo sed egestas egestas fringilla phasellus...

65%Goal:$20,000Raised:$13,000To Go:$7,000
ACTIVITY

Play Area for Cats to Keep Them Always Active

Diam volutpat commodo sed egestas egestas fringilla phasellus...

42%Goal:$20,000Raised:$8,500To Go:$11,500
VETERINARY

Help Puppies by Paying for Veterinarian Services

Diam volutpat commodo sed egestas egestas fringilla phasellus...

VOLUNTEER Real stories

A Small Part of Happy Stories
